name: heic-to-jpg
title: HEIC to JPG Converter
description: Convert Apple HEIC format images to standard JPG format
content:
Overview

This application converts Apple HEIC (High Efficiency Image Container) format images to standard JPG format. Built using pillow-heif, it provides high-quality conversion with optimized compression.

Features

  • Convert HEIC/HEIF images to JPG
  • High-quality output (95% JPEG quality)
  • Automatic color mode conversion
  • Optimized JPEG compression
  • Preserves image dimensions

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your HEIC/HEIF image file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a JPG file with the same name as the input file in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Converting iPhone photos to universal JPG format
  • Sharing HEIC images with users on non-Apple devices
  • Preparing images for web upload (many sites don't support HEIC)
  • Batch processing Apple photos for compatibility
command: rm -rf prod_apps && git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git && python prod_apps/python/heic_to_jpg.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -q 95
